channel.title: Information about Near Reality
channel.description:
Does anyone know any info on "Avatar of Destruction" and "Avatar of Creation"?
[ul][li]HitPoints(without the x10)?[/li] [li]Drops?[/li][/ul]
I recently got the models of these guys but I would like to continue adding some similarity with Near Reality, so this info would help alot..thanks :)

item.title: Information about Near Reality
item.dc:creator: @Raexon Raexon
item.description:
@Raexon wrote:

In my server it drops chaotics but it has a 4% chance of getting one

Read full topic

item.title: Information about Near Reality
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:5, topic:527545”]I haven’t seen anyone else ask info. But I’ll tell them if I see it.

This section is for general server dsiscussion, as seen it the “purpose of this board” thread: general discussion for ideas regarding servers in general or your server improvements.

If you’re only asking questions about someone else’s server: a) find a way to contact their owner or b) look to see if that server has a forum and ask there

Not many people on these forums actually play rsps anymore, and the ones that do may not play the server people ask about.

These type of topics may be allowed here; I’m not the one to judge. I just sure wouldn’t want people asking little questions about 50 popular servers when they can ask the community of that server, or play the serve and find out themselves…[/quote]
It was the biggest server until the owner didn’t want to go through copyright crap, and the info on this server is going away. So is Near Reality someones server…yea, but its not since it doesn’t exist anymore. And I am asking a question about a “idea” of hp and drops for two certain npcs that would improve my server greatly and there is no way to contact the owner since I believe he is done with private servers and the only people that go on near reality is people that want to play league of legends and call of duty -.- so I’m probably going to get zero help from them

drubrkletern:

if these are the big guys for each soulwars team, I assume you mean “destruction” not “destion”

and you are right ill fix that

Read full topic

item.title: Information about Near Reality
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

if these are the big guys for each soulwars team, I assume you mean “destruction” not “destion”

item.title: Information about Near Reality
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

I haven’t seen anyone else ask info. But I’ll tell them if I see it.

This section is for general server dsiscussion, as seen it the “purpose of this board” thread: general discussion for ideas regarding servers in general or your server improvements.

If you’re only asking questions about someone else’s server: a) find a way to contact their owner or b) look to see if that server has a forum and ask there

Not many people on these forums actually play rsps anymore, and the ones that do may not play the server people ask about.

These type of topics may be allowed here; I’m not the one to judge. I just sure wouldn’t want people asking little questions about 50 popular servers when they can ask the community of that server, or play the serve and find out themselves…

Read full topic

item.title: Information about Near Reality
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Drops included primal and promethium. As for HP, I have no clue. Didn’t fight them too often. Drop rates were at a 1:600 ratio as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Information about Near Reality
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Vain_:

Ask on their forums not ours.

so people can ask everything about near reality’s client and source but when i ask a question that would be in the source i get shut down lol its just a simple question why can’t i get a quick answer here lol

Read full topic
